parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new CharacterStyle &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the CharacterStyle.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharacterStyle with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharacterStyle with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharacterStyle with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharacterStyles within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The CharacterStyle, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: CharacterStyle, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The CharacterStyle, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: CharacterStyle, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first CharacterStyle in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last CharacterStyle in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle CharacterStyle in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharacterStyle with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the CharacterStyle that follows the desired CharacterStyle.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharacterStyle whose index follows the specified CharacterStyle in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The CharacterStyle whose index comes before the desired CharacterStyle.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any CharacterStyle in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every CharacterStyle in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CharacterStyle.
Returns the CharacterStyle with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection. Can return: Long Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.
